page.title: 08Food and Shopping
page.content: A class survey at Redmyre School revealed the following food preferences: Mince & Potatoes-8-votes sausage and chips-4votes, salad-2votes fish and chips-1vote, stovies (minced beef mixed with potatoes)1 vote. So mince and potatoes is the favourite dish. Another class survey revealed shopping patterns; 11 families shop regularly in fine Fare, Montrose, 5 in Aberdeen and 2 in Forfar, It appear that Fine Fare, Montrose, 5 in Aberdeen and 2 in Forfar, It appears that Fine Fare is popular because it has variety and low prices. The 2 shops in Fordoun Village are convenient but expensive. The post ofice sells newspapers, sweets, food and household goods. The cafe, called the Coffee pot,caters mostly for lorry drivers.
